about_the_game:
FIGHT


  • Dynamic Combat
    Seamlessly switch between bows, spells, swords, and more in the heat of battle.
  • Skill Tree
    With over 100 spells and abilities to master, you can mold your character from stealth archer to battlemage.
  • Bosses
    Encounter battle-hardened enemies and unique story bosses.

BUILD


  • Recources
    Sustain your guild through fishing, farming, mining, and trade.
  • Building
    Construct your guild hall or fortress using a fully modular building and decorating system.
  • Recruiting
    Recruit a diverse array of companions, each bringing unique combat skills to your guild.

EXPLORE


  • Open World
    Roam without loading screens. Explore forgotten ruins, delve into caves and dungeons, and uncover the secrets of ancient civilizations.
  • Quests
    Aid those in need, complete quests or contracts for legendary loot and valuable rewards.
  • Loot
    Find treasure through combat, exploration, and quests. Equip unique gear with amazing perks and stats.

EXPERIENCE


  • Your Guild
    Begin anew, rebuilding your guild from scratch. Regain reputation, reconstruct your guildhall, and recruit companions.
  • The other Guilds
    Resource wars fractured the continent, creating opportunities for rising factions. Navigate diverse kingdoms, each with unique ties to the guilds.
  • Eternal Rift
    In ages past, the dimensional Rift birthed the Shadowspawn. Though the guilds sealed it, remnants endure. Now, a new rift forms, and your guild faces an unstoppable darkness.

short_description: Guildbound, an immersive open-world Story RPG. Embark on epic quests, conquer dungeons, craft, build, recruit companions, and shape your character's destiny in a vast seamless world.
